attributes.action: Investigation into vets inflated prices on medication for small animals
attributes.additional_details: The small pets industry to vets is a a money cow with many unsuspecting owners knowing little about being able to get there medication for there beloved pets at a fraction of the cost - the small pets industry owners are being totally ripped off and this needs to be addressed and capped
attributes.background: Vets in small pet industry administering medication at huge inflated prices needs to be capped & monitored the inflation they charge on basic medication is ripping the owners of small animals off every single day how can a product be brought for £6.49 over the counter be charged £30.52 at the vets?

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705499
